NEPType

String with the name of a nonlinear eigensolver

Synopsis

typedef const char* NEPType;
#define NEPRII       "rii"
#define NEPSLP       "slp"
#define NEPNARNOLDI  "narnoldi"
#define NEPCISS      "ciss"
#define NEPINTERPOL  "interpol"
#define NEPNLEIGS    "nleigs"

See Also

NEPSetType(), NEP
